Latest Archive

Say goodbye to news anxiety.

Join the community of empowered news consumers who start the day with our email — positive vibes included.

the DONUT* Ingredients

Fact-based News

Opinion-free information

Equal representation on the issues

Relentless positivity

* served to your inbox daily

I think staying informed is paramount. I used to spend a lot of time searching multiple publications b/c I’ve always recognized that both sides lean to fit a specific narrative, and the more I know, the better I’ll be able to form my own opinion vs the standard “herd mentality"

- Time conscious subscriber

Finally…a company involved in politics that doesn’t pick a side and gives you all the information you need to form your own opinion.

- Free thinking subscriber

Imagine if you could open your email every morning to read the news, get the major headlines out of the way and then be able to dig deeper for a better understanding to flex on your friends with how well informed you sound regardless of your political affiliation... or lack there of.

- Continuously flexing subscriber

Consuming “big box” news today has become exhausting. Can I get an AMEN?! The past few years I have found myself starting to ignore political news all together. The DONUT allows me to view the full scope of a topic while displaying positivity.

- Formerly exhausted subscriber

The Daily DONUT is a game changer. I can get informed on what’s going on in the world without any negative or twisted spin. It actually makes the news fun again.

-Fun loving subscriber

You believe the news should be fact-based and opinion-free. So do we.

Join the community of empowered news consumers who start the day with our email — positive vibes included.
